column2: VARDESC
During the past 90 days, on how many days have you attended one or more self-help group meetings (such as AA, NA, CA, or Social Recovery) for your alcohol or other drug use? Days
In the past 90 days, have you . . . spoken up (shared) during a self-help meeting?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . had a sponsor?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . talked to your sponsor at a meeting?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . talked to your sponsor or other members outside of a meeting?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . asked for help from your sponsor or another member?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . read the Twelve Steps and Twelve Traditions or other recovery-related readings?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . actively worked the 12 steps?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . prayed or meditated for help from your Higher Power?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . felt that other people in the meeting understood you and your problems?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . felt that you understood other people in the meeting and their problems?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . gotten advice or ideas about how to handle your problems better from a meeting or meeting members?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . agreed with the advice you were given?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . considered yourself a member of a home group (what is the specific name of the group)?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . considered yourself a member of a home group (what is the specific name of the group)?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . helped someone else from a meeting?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . sponsored someone else?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . performed a service like setting up for meetings, serving as meeting chairperson, treasurer, or literature person?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . participated in conferences, dances, picnics, or other social activities sponsored by a self-help group?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . had a spiritual awakening through meeting, working the steps, or reading 12-step related literature?
In the past 90 days, have you . . . considered participation in self-help meetings an important part of your life?
Do you consider yourself to be a “regular attendee or member” of any specific 12-step fellowships, faith-based, secular, or other recovery groups? (Which groups?) (Any other groups?)
Alcoholics Anonymous (AA)
Cocaine Anonymous (CA)
Dual Diagnosis Anonymous (DDA)
LifeRing Secular Recovery
Narcotics Anonymous (NA)
Secular Organization for Sobriety (SOS)
Social Recovery (SR)
Women for Sobriety (WFS)
Adult Children of Alcoholics (ACOA)
Other 12-step recovery group (Please describe)
Other 12-step recovery group (Please describe)
Other faith-based recovery group (Please describe)
Other faith-based recovery group (Please describe)
Other secular recovery group (Please describe)
Other secular recovery group (Please describe)
Other recovery group (Please describe)
Other recovery group (Please describe)
